person.persName: John McAuley Palmer (Military Governor of Kentucky)

body.p: Born at Eagle Creek, Scott County, Ky., September 13, 1817. Palmer was a lawyer, judge, and Republican politician before the war. He was appointed colonel of the Fourteenth Regiment, Illinois Volunteer Infantry in 1861. He later served as Military Governor of Kentucky in early 1865 and was mustered out as a major general in 1866.
